name: Trap Shrine / 女装神社 Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Trap Shrine / 女装神社 Original Soundtrack.
This OST has 12 tracks including whole song of the game theme song "Kamisama Mousou Sakurairo" and its karaoke in MP3 and FLAC format.

Track list
00_OP_神様妄想桜色(Whole song)
01_日常01
02_日常02
03_ドタバタ
04_結ばれる時
05_思い出
06_悲しみ
07_神
08_奇跡
09_緊張
10_危険
11_OP_神様妄想桜色(Karaoke Ver.)

short_description: Trap Shrine / 女装神社 Original Soundtrack. This OST has 12 tracks including whole song of the game theme song "Kamisama Mousou Sakurairo" and its karaoke in MP3 and FLAC format.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Microsoft Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Процессор: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card
  • DirectX: Версии 9.0c
  • Место на диске: 300 MB
  • Звуковая карта: Integrated Sound Chip
